jobDescription: If you like to hack using unix shell scripts, perl, ruby or python, we have a job for you.  Constant Contact is looking to fill an intern level position to help evaluate and build security related products. Candidate will work alongside product management, engineering and security teams to integrate, test and evaluate new cutting edge 3rd party tools.  Interested candidate needs to be familiar with UNIX and enjoys creating script/programs with one or more of the following languages: Python, Ruby, Perl, TCL, Unix Shell. Familiar understanding of TCP/IP networks, DNS, HTTP/REST or XML a plus.  Educational minimum: High School + 1 year Computer Science (or equivalent).
